page.title: 18Retiring To The Village
page.content: Mr.Mc.Crossan retired to Moniaive three years ago.He came here because he liked the scenery,the peace and quiet and the way of life.He also came here because some of his family live and work in the village.He retired when he was 58 years old and came from Clydebank near Glasgow.He was born into a family of twelve and they only had two rooms in a tenement building. Like most people from that area he used to work in the shipyards.He loves Moniaive but would like to see a much improved bus service because he does not have a car and there are only three buses a day to and from the village.
